alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Flat Tops; Lower Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 12:36PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF FLAT TOPS...LOWER YAMPA RIVER BASIN...AND CENTRAL YAMPA RIVER BASIN COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1236 PM MST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from 35 miles west of Craig to 7 miles northeast of Meeker and moving north at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Axial, Loyd, Juniper Springs, Sunbeam and Maybell. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 40 in Colorado between mile markers 51 and 71. Colorado 13 between mile markers 47 and 70. Colorado 318 between mile markers 42 and 60. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Flat Tops; Lower Yampa River Basin
